$comment: v2 infrastructure stub. Schema exists for documentation and manual use. Automated Actions to manage liens/unlocks/slashing planned for v3.

liens[].actor: GitHub username of the contributor whose reputation is locked
liens[].action: Type of action that triggered the lien (merge, approve, vouch)
liens[].pr_number: PR number associated with this lien
liens[].lock_date: ISO 8601 date when the lien was created
liens[].maturation_date: ISO 8601 date when the lien matures (lock_date + 30 days)

circuit_breaker_log[].date: ISO 8601 date of the circuit breaker event
circuit_breaker_log[].actor: GitHub username of the contributor involved
circuit_breaker_log[].trigger: Event that triggered the circuit breaker (revert_for_cause, ci_tampering, etc.)
circuit_breaker_log[].domains_affected: List of domains where the contributor was demoted
circuit_breaker_log[].liens_slashed: List of lien IDs that were slashed as a result
